title: Shining Staver-of-Skulls
content:
3 Shining Staver-of-Skulls Location & Where to Find

Location: Grymforge Merchant: Corsair Greymon, if you convince him to lead you into Grymforge peacefully. Dropped by: Corsair Greymon, on boat to Grymforge.

Shining Staver-of-Skulls Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 65 Gp. Weight: 0.9 Kg. Radiant Damage is not applied when Throwing the weapon.

All Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3 Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambu
